text: Anɨb ak yad mam chɨn okok kɨlop ned agyokin agɨl gos nepin. Kɨli am nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, mani ñɨnɨgabun apek ak dɨ nan gem yonɨmuŋ. Anɨgem, yad binɨb ogɨnap ayɨp amjakɨnɨgabun ñɨn ak, gos nɨbi ke nɨŋɨd mani ñɨbɨm ak, kɨli nɨgɨnɨgabal. Chɨn mani tap nɨbi okok yokɨp nep dɨnɨgabun agɨl gos nopun ak, gos nɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab.
